attributes.action: To publish the 1951 population census in the year 2031 and following censuses.
attributes.background: Last census will be published in 2021 for 30 years. No census in 1931 due to a fire. No census in 1941 due to World War 2. American Federal Census for 1950 is the next one of theirs to be published. Average age of people living is 70 years of age. It will not contravene privacy laws of the majority

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We think that you want the 1951 population census to be published in 2031. We are not clear what you would like to happen to the "following censuses". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition calling for all census data to be published 80 years after the date of the census.
